moves.name: Fell Stinger
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by 3 stat ranks when it knocks out a target with this move.

moves.name: Sure Crit
moves.effect: Applies the Critical Hit Next effect to the user.

moves.name: Twineedle
moves.effect: Attacks twice in a row. Has a chance (20%) of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: Beehold My Research!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 1 stat rank. Raises the user’s evasiveness by 3 stat ranks.

syncMove.name: Bug Expert Twineedle
syncMove.description: Become Mega Beedrill until the end of battle.

passives.name: Critical Strike 2
passives.description: Powers up the user’s attacks when they become critical hits.
